ns0:entry.ns0:title: GDQuest/learn-gdscript
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/GDQuest/learn-gdscript
Language: gdscript
Learn Godot's GDScript programming language from zero, right in your browser, for free.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: HungryProton/scatter
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/HungryProton/scatter
Language: gdscript
Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes

ns0:entry.ns0:title: KsanaDock/Microverse
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/KsanaDock/Microverse
Language: gdscript
A god-simulation sandbox game built on Godot 4 as a multi-agent AI social simulation system. In this virtual world, AI characters possess independent thinking and memory, capable of autonomous social interactions, task completion, and developing complex social relationships through continuous communication.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
Language: gdscript
Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: RodZill4/material-maker
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/RodZill4/material-maker
Language: gdscript
A procedural textures authoring and 3D model painting tool based on the Godot game engine

ns0:entry.ns0:title: dialogic-godot/dialogic
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/dialogic-godot/dialogic
Language: gdscript
ðŸ’¬ Create Dialogs, Visual Novels, RPGs, and manage Characters with Godot to create your Game!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: mbrlabs/Lorien
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/mbrlabs/Lorien
Language: gdscript
Infinite canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Made with Godot.
